title: Breakingviews TV: Spotify airs
text:
Breakingviews TV: Spotify airs 12:46pm EST - 03:24 
The music-streaming service has filed for its much-anticipated initial public offering. Rob Cyran and Tom Buerkle discuss how Spotify’s lack of profitability and unique method of ensuring the voting control of its two founders are red flags for potential investors. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The music-streaming service has filed for its much-anticipated initial public offering. Rob Cyran and Tom Buerkle discuss how Spotify’s lack of profitability and unique method of ensuring the voting control of its two founders are red flags for potential investors.
